about_the_game:
I'm Will, your avatar in this escape room.



...Initialization...

Imagine waking up every day in the same confined flat that you apparently can't get out of, without knowing how or why you are there.
A few moments of exploration remind you that this is your home, and lead you to the fixed computer, presumably yours, although you have to carry out a number of twisted little operations to get everything to work properly, in the midst of the ambient muddle of convoluted searches that you've lost track of.

The tasks repeat themselves: wake up, a cup of coffee, power on the computer, update the software, start working...
What do you mean it doesn't suit you? Would you... leave? You would like to... change the script...? Hang on, what are you doing, hang on...!

//Will.exe encountered an error. Restart in progress...//

...Initialization...

Will.exe is not a typical escape room. The levels evolve... The artistic direction reflects the gameplay, which...

//Will.exe encountered an error. Restart in progress...//

...Initialization...
detailed_description:
GameCup 2023

Will is the winner of GameCup 2023, BOSS category

name: Will.exe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Will.exe, a game whose character no longer wants to be played. Not anymore.
